revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Zidoo |model=X9 |revision=S |ean=6970123910064 |asin=B01LWL88BM |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |fcc_date=10/18/2016 |fcc_id=2AGN7-X9S |type=Android media player, media streamer |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTD1295;RTD1295DD; |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 GiB |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=016G70 |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=DDR3 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SATA 3.0, HDMI |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=1 |expansion_hdmi_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8821AU |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_ant_conn=MHF4, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |flags=TF Card slot, Bluetooth 4.0, HDMI in/out, TOSLINK/Analog Audio out, 4K, IR receiver |stock_os=Android;6.0;Marshmallow; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, (NAS) |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} {{TagLine|Smart TV Box}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.zidoo.tv/Product/index/model/X9S/target/rRwtRFydZ4xKKmVViAFMcQ%3D%3D.html}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Realtek]] RTD1295DD @1.4GHz :Quad Core ARM (Cortex-A53) *GPU: ARM Mali-T820 MP3 (3-core) *Flash: 16GB (eMMC) :[[Toshiba]] 016G70 (current) :[[Samsung]] AWPD3R (first models) *RAM: ''Hynix'' 2GB (DDR3) *WLAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8821AU (802.11ac), BT 4.0 LE *Ethernet: 1x GbE (10/100/1000Mbps) RJ45 port *USB: 2x USB 2.0, 1x USB 3.0 ports *Operating System: Android 6.0 (''Marshmallow'')
===Interfaces=== *1x TF card reader SD card interface :(support 1/2/4/8/16/32 GB) *1x SATA 3.0 (6Gbps) slot *2x USB 2.0 port, 1x USB 3.0 port *1x Composite video and audio port *1x S/SPDIF (2ch, 5.1ch), 1x IR receiver *1x VFD Vacuum Fluorescent Display (VFD)
===Video/Audio=== *HDR, 10-bit HEVC/H.265 up to 4K @60fps :H.264 up to 4K @60fps, VP9 up to 4K @60fps *Blu-ray better compatibility :Automatic frame rate switching :Built in ZDMC (Base on kodi 16.0) :Powerful subtitles, support MVC ISO/MKV *HD audio (7.1ch) decode and passthrough
===HDMI=== *HDMI 2.0a output, Support 4K @60fps, support :HD Audio (7.1CH), support 23.976 and 29.94 *HDMI 2.0a input, Support PIP, HDMI IN stream :recording and stream output via UPD/RTSP
===Models=== :;[https://www.zidoo.tv/Product/allProduct.html ''Zidoo'' product] *[[Zidoo X7]] • [https://www.zidoo.tv/Product/spec/model/X7/target/apG5We1In1pKKmVViAFMcQ%3D%3D.html Spec.] *[[Zidoo X9]] • [https://www.zidoo.tv/Product/spec/model/X9/target/rdOqbsJTP8k%3D.html Spec.] *[[Zidoo X9S]] • [https://www.zidoo.tv/Product/spec/model/X9S/target/rRwtRFydZ4xKKmVViAFMcQ%3D%3D.html Spec.] *[[Zidoo X10]] • [https://www.zidoo.tv/Product/spec/model/X10/target/xqwZ8QMj6ZVKKmVViAFMcQ%3D%3D.html Spec.] *[[Zidoo Z9S]] • [https://www.zidoo.tv/Product/spec/model/Z9S/target/2INlOr7QH%2B1KKmVViAFMcQ%3D%3D.html Spec.] *[[Zidoo Z9X]] • [https://www.zidoo.tv/Product/spec/model/Z9X/target/VEMg6VRC2%2B9KKmVViAFMcQ%3D%3D.html Spec.] *[[Zidoo Z10]] • [https://www.zidoo.tv/Product/spec/model/Z10/target/7kv1voas1D1KKmVViAFMcQ%3D%3D.html Spec.] *[[Zidoo Z10 Pro]] • [https://www.zidoo.tv/Product/spec/model/Z10+PRO/target/7ogeLPHKQt1KKmVViAFMcQ%3D%3D.html Spec.]
